content:
ICS 160E / EECS 114 - Algorithms Homework 1, 50 Points
Due: Friday, April 8, 2005, at 3pm in the ICS Distribution Center

  1. 10 points. Problem R-1.6 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  2. 10 points. Problem R-1.14 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  3. 10 points. Problem C-1.10 from Goodrich-Tamassia. (Hint: If you remember Calculus I, read the very last sentence in the Goodrich-Tamassia text.)
  4. 10 points. Problem C-1.14 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  5. 10 points. Problem C-1.25 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
